snippet: A New York police officer, Jose Ramos, and Wanda Abreu were indicted on charges they conspired to have a witness against him killed.
abstract: New York Police Officer Jose Ramos, accused recently in a broad investigation of ticket-fixing in the Bronx, is indicted on charges he conspired to have a witness against him killed; Ramos' wife Wanda Abreu is also charged; both plead not guilty.
lead_paragraph: A New York police officer, Jose Ramos, and Wanda Abreu were indicted on charges they conspired to have a witness against him killed.

headline.seo: Ticket-Fixing Defendant, Jose Ramos, Accused of Murder Plot
headline.main: Officer in Ticket-Fixing Inquiry Is Accused of Trying to Kill Witness
headline.print_headline: Officer in Ticket-Fixing Inquiry Is Accused of Trying to Kill Witness
